title: Police investigate death of man found with gunshot wound
content:
Police are investigating the death of a man found early Sunday morning in a vehicle with a gunshot wound.
Police found a vehicle parked in the middle of the road on North 1st Avenue at 4:21 a.m., said Sgt. Shaun Olson with Sioux Falls Police. According to the police call log, a gunshot was reported near the intersection of North 1st Avenue and North Riverside at that time.
A man in the vehicle was unconscious, not breathing and bleeding from a gunshot wound.
The man was pronounced dead on scene.
No further information was available. The investigation is ongoing.
